meanings.definition: a large order of insects, including bees, wasps, and ants
meanings.sent1: Hymenopterons are important pollinators in nature.
meanings.sent2: I saw a variety of hymenopterons buzzing around the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was interrupted by a group of curious hymenopterons.
meanings.sent4: The garden was alive with the busy hum of hymenopterons.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch hymenopterons at work in the garden.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of hymenopterons
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the hymenopterons behavior closely.
meanings.sent2: The hive displayed typical hymenopterons characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The party had a buzz of excitement, like a hymenopterons nest.
meanings.sent4: Her work ethic was as diligent as a hymenopterons colony.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a symphony of colors, just like hymenopterons wings.
